org.grouplens.lenskit.core

Class LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.core.LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader

  • public class LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load a pre-built recommender engine from a file.
    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Detail

      • getClassLoader

        public java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Get the configured class loader.
        Returns:
        The class loader that will be used when loading the engine.

      • setClassLoader

        public LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader setClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Set the class loader to use when reading the engine.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The class loader to use.
        Returns:
        The loader (for chaining).

      • addConfiguration

        public LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader addConfiguration(LenskitConfiguration config)
        Add a configuration to use when loading the configuration. The loaded graph will be post-processed to add in components bound by this configuration. If the engine was saved with excluded configurations, then this method should be used to provide configurations to reinstate any objects excluded from the saved model. The loader will throw an exception if the loaded model has any unresolved placeholders.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration to add.
        Returns:
        The loader (for chaining).

      • setValidationMode

        public LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader setValidationMode(EngineValidationMode mode)
        Set the validation mode for loading the recommender engine. The default mode is EngineValidationMode.IMMEDIATE.
        Parameters:
        mode - The validation mode.
        Returns:
        The loader (for chaining).

      • setCompressionMode

        public void setCompressionMode(CompressionMode comp)
        Set the compression mode to use. The default is CompressionMode.AUTO.
        Parameters:
        comp - The compression mode.

      • load

        public LenskitRecommenderEngine load(@WillClose
                            java.io.InputStream stream)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     RecommenderConfigurationException
        Load a recommender engine from an input stream.

        Note: this method is only capable of auto-detecting gzip-compressed data. If the compression mode is CompressionMode.AUTO, only gzip-compressed streams are supported. Set the compression mode manually if you are using XZ compression.

        Parameters:
        stream - The input stream.
        Returns:
        The deserialized recommender.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the input data.
        RecommenderConfigurationException - if there is a configuration error with the deserialized recommender or the configurations applied to it.

      • load

        public LenskitRecommenderEngine load(java.io.File file)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     RecommenderConfigurationException
        Load a recommender from a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The recommender model file to load.
        Returns:
        The recommender engine.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the input data.
        RecommenderConfigurationException - if there is a configuration error with the deserialized recommender or the configurations applied to it.
